requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 2800+ @ 1.8 Ghz and Intel Pentium IV @ 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 512 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 1 GB of RAM

results.name: Victor (itch) (Emperor S P O O N)
